about_the_game:
Think fast to solve 100 colorful labyrinth puzzles and color your world!



Travel the world and through the seasons on a journey full of colorful labyrinths. Think fast and leave no path unpainted! Color each maze with as few moves as possible to earn 3 stars and unlock new challenging levels. Play 100 levels and encounter obstacles such as moving walls, teleporters and treadmills!

Challenge a friend in the multiplayer mode! Who will come up with the best strategy to become the champion? Use special power-ups to get an edge over your opponents. Only the smartest players will be victorious, and paint the world in their color!

Features:
  • 100 colorful levels with increasing difficulty
  • 8+ obstacles and useful tools such as teleporters, pressure plates and bouncy walls
  • Multiplayer mode for two players. Use your smarts (and power-ups) to win!

name: Color Your World

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1), Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0GHz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: (Integrated): Intel HD Graphics or AMD Radeon HD Graphics (Discrete): Nvidia GeForce 9600 GT or AMD Radeon HD 2400
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek® Audio

short_description: Think fast to solve 100 colorful labyrinth puzzles and color your world! Color each maze, earn 3 stars and unlock new challenging levels. Play 100 levels and encounter obstacles such as moving walls, teleporters and treadmills!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Traditional Chinese
